duties_responsibilities.duty: An endless desire to improve the automation of the accounting and reporting process
Execute monthly accounting close procedures and deliverables (journal entries, reconciliations, reports) in compliance with GAAP
Ready monthly consolidated P&L and Balance Sheet flux analysis for management reporting
Operate with business partners to create compliance with corporate accounting policies, procedures and controls and provide support on special requests

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in Accounting, Minimum 5-7 years of overall general accounting experience
